title.en: My Sect's Senior Disciple Has a Hole in His Brain

altTitles.en: There's a Pit in My Senior's Brain
There's Something Wrong with My Da Shixiong's Brain

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Jia Da Shi Xiong Nao Zi You Keng

description.en:
The hilarious adventures of the eldest disciple of a sect who has a problem with his brain. Dong Fang Xian Yun was reincarnated as the most senior disciple of the Carefree sect. But the only thing that goes through his mind is to make sure he doesn't end up dying by the hands of the "main character". Read as he makes no sense to his fellow disciples while avoiding flags left and right.  
  
*Note : Although there are many chapters listed as missing, nothing is actually missing, some of chapter combining into one.*

altTitles.en: The Ichinose Family's Deadly Sins

altTitles.pt-br: Os Pecados Capitais da Família Ichinose

description.en: Tsubasa Ichinose is a middle schooler who loses his memory in an accident. He is able to safely reunite with his family, but is soon faced with a new shocking reality... What is going on with this family?! From the creator of Takopi's Original Sin comes a new kind of dramatic story!
description.pt-br: Ichinose Tsubasa é um estudante do ensino médio que perdeu a memória em um acidente. Ele é capaz de se reunir com segurança com sua família, mas logo se depara com uma nova realidade chocante... O que está acontecendo com essa família?!

altTitles.ja: 悪友の俺がポンコツ騎士を見てられないんだが、どう世話を焼きゃいい? ～まどめ外伝～

altTitles.ru: Я, заклятый друг, не могу смотреть на эту глупую девушку-рыцаря. Как же мне о ней заботиться?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's (Friend's) Dilemma: How to Babysit a Crybaby Knight

description.en: A clumsy knight and a magician who struggles to understand his own feelings. The story of how two arch-enemies end up closer than they ever thought they would be. Spin-off of「Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?」, which follows the daily life of Barbaros on his job of protecting the Captain of the Holy Knights, Chastel Lillqvist.
description.id: Spin-off dari Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga Dou Medereba Ii?
description.pt-br: Um cavaleiro desajeitado e um mágico que luta para entender seus próprios sentimentos. A história de como dois arqui-inimigos acabam mais próximos do que jamais pensaram que estariam. Spin-off de 「Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?」, que segue a vida diária de Bárbaros em seu trabalho de proteger o Capitão dos Cavaleiros Sagrados, Chastel Lillqvist.

altTitles.en: My Older Sister's Friend
The Cutest Girl Closest to Me.

description.en:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother...or rather, pet? A love story between a gal who has a bugged sense of proximity and an otaku guy who acts like her parent!

Chapters 3 and onwards can be found in the [serialised version](https://mangadex.org/title/1d330951-583e-423e-9cd7-abcd6f761f53/ane-no-tomodachi)
description.ja: 男子高校生・旭の家に入り浸る、姉の友人・ひなこ。いつも思わせぶりな態度で心を惑わせるのは、弟…というかペット？扱いだからと思っていたけれど…？距離感バグりぎみギャル×おかん系オタク男子、ジレきゅんラブ！

altTitles.ja: シメジシミュレーション

description.en:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.
description.fr: Une jeune fille s'est enfermée dans son placard pendant ses 2 dernières années de collège et se rend compte qu'elle doit maintenant passer au lycée. Quand elle sort de son placard pour la première fois en deux ans et se regarde dans le miroir, elle s'aperçoit que des champignons « shimeji » ont commencé à pousser sur sa tête.

altTitles.en: Dogs Red

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?

altTitles.en: Himari's Surroundings

description.en: Aizawa Haruki, 16 years old, is in his 2nd year of high school, and likes to live efficiently. One day during summer vacation, a girl, Aizawa Himari, suddenly appears, calling him 'Onii-chan' and claiming that she's his little sister. As it turns out, Haruki's father recently remarried, and his new wife brought a daughter with her. However, since both of their parents are overseas, it'll only be the two of them living under the same roof. And for some reason, Himari seems very obstinate about spending as much time with Haruki as she can.

Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
description.ja: クソ真面目で融通が利かない男子高校生・鈴紀光太郎は生意気な後輩ギャル・百舌そら子と犬猿の仲。そんな二人には秘密が…それは二人が許嫁関係で同棲していること!? 資産家の家族を持つそら子と結婚をする条件で、光太郎は潰れる寸前の父の会社を買収してもらっていたのだ!! あの手この手（エッ●なこと）で責めるメスガキそら子にたいし、光太郎は彼女を屈服させ、無事に結婚をすることができるのか――!!?

とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

title.en: The Most Notorious "Talker" Runs the World's Greatest Clan

altTitles.ja: 最凶の支援職【話術士】である俺は世界最強クランを従える

altTitles.en: I'm the Most Evil Support Class【Talker】and I'll Subdue the Strongest Clan in the World

altTitles.vi: "Thánh Ngôn" khét tiếng nhất là người điều hành Clan vĩ đại nhất thế giới

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou no Shien-shoku "Wajutsushi" Dearu Ore wa Sekai Saikyou Kuran wo Shitagaeru

altTitles.es-la: Soy el Talker más Despiadado y Dominaré al Clan más Fuerte del Mundo

description.en:
Noel, a youth who admires his grandfather, who was hailed as a hero, and aspires to be the strongest Seeker. But his Job that appeared in the appraisal, was the support class Talker.

Talker is a peaky job with the weakest individual abilities. A job that could never become the strongest.

"If I create the strongest clan and become the clan master, then I’ll essentially be the strongest."

Thinking that, Noel worked hard persistently to fulfil his ambition. On the other hand, the merciless methods he employed for the sake of his ambition were acknowledged by everyone as the path of "evil." However, Noel’s distinct talent attracted many powerful people and they began to gather under him…

This is the story of how the most evil Talker, who seeks to be the strongest, subdues his allies and creates the strongest clan in the world.
description.vi: Đây là hành trình vươn tới đỉnh cao giới truy thủ của kẻ sinh ra mang trong mình một trong những chức nghiệp được đánh giá là yếu nhất - Noel Stollen.
description.es-la:
Noel, un joven que admira a su abuelo, que fue aclamado como un gran héroe, aspira a ser un buscador fuerte como él. Pero el trabajo que apareció en su evaluación, fue la clase de soporte “Talker” (Orador).

Talker es un trabajo con las habilidades individuales más débiles. Un trabajo que nunca podría convertirse en el más fuerte.

「Si creo el clan más fuerte y me convierto en el líder del clan, entonces esencialmente seré el más fuerte」

Pensando eso, y gracias al apoyo de su abuelo, Noel trabajó y entrenó arduamente por años con el objetivo de cumplir su ambición. Por otro lado, los métodos crueles que empleó por el bien de su ambición fueron reconocidos como inhumanos. Sin embargo, el talento distintivo de Noel atrajo a muchas personas poderosas y comenzaron a reunirse debajo de él...

Esta es la historia del Talker más despiadado que busca ser el más fuerte, forjando aliados para crear el clan más fuerte del mundo.

description.ja: 17歳の美少女・たえと、まじめな会社員の小太郎。一見幸せそうに見える二人には誰にも言えない秘密があった――伊賀・甲賀のライバル忍者がこっそり同棲生活を送る、まったりラブコメ！

description.en: An owner of a flower shop has a deficit management, then he encounter the forbidden plant cannabis.
description.ja: 花屋を営む千東森生(41)は、妻と高校生の娘との 3 人暮らし。花屋の経営は芳しくなく、妻はパートに出て、なんとか生計を立てていた。そんな折に届いた大学の同窓会の報せ。妻に後押しされ、同窓会へ参加した森生は、かつての親友・加賀山に声をかけられる。久々の再会に、昔を懐かしむ森生だったが、加賀山からとある仕事を提案され…。

description.en:
Maeda is a new student in the Teiken High School. He stutters when he's nervous and he's rather clumsy. He gets noted immediately because he hits a teacher during the entrance ceremony. Some clubs search to enlist him as they see in him a force they can use to get even with other clubs. But Maeda is a loner and has only one dream: becoming boxing champion. His first objective is to beat the leader of the boxing club. "Rokudenashi" translates as "good for nothing".  
  
The manga focuses more on gang warfare than boxing.
description.es:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Algunos clubes buscan alistarlo ya que ven en él una fuerza que pueden utilizar para vengarse de otros clubes. Pero Maeda es un solitario y sólo tiene un sueño: convertirse en campeón de boxeo. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.
description.es-la:
Maeda es un estudiante nuevo en el instituto Teiken. Tartamudea cuando está nervioso y es bastante torpe. Se hace notar inmediatamente porque golpea a un profesor durante la ceremonia de ingreso. Su primer objetivo es vencer al líder del club de boxeo. "Rokudenashi" se traduce como "bueno para nada".

El manga se centra más en la lucha entre pandillas que en el boxeo.

description.en:
Guided by a blessing, the fading adventurer who has reached the land between the two lands sets out on a journey to become the king of Elde - and he is not alone.

This comic book depicts Elden Ring's epic adventures, including fascinating characters encountered along the way, various dungeon explorations, and battles with powerful bosses.

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en:
Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art.  
  
But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!

altTitles.en: Bocchi Hitori's ____ Life
The ____ Life of Being Alone

description.en:
Hitori Bocchi suffers from extreme social anxiety, she’s not good at talking to people, takes pretty extreme actions, is surprisingly adept at avoiding people, her legs cramp when she overexerts herself, gets full of herself when alone, will vomit when exposed to extreme tension and often comes up with plans. Now she is entering middle school and her only friend, Yawara Kai, is attending a different school. Kai gives her an ultimatum: she'll stop being Bocchi's friend until Bocchi befriends all of her classmates. Will Bocchi make it!?  

---
  
**Links:**  
- [Alternative Raw](http://daiohg.dengeki.com/lineup/516/)  
- [Alternative Raw 2](http://daiohg.dengeki.com/sp/bocchi/)
- [Alternative Raw 3 - Pixiv Comics](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/2176)
description.it: Hitori Bocchi è molto ansiosa, non è brava a parlare con gli altri ed evita il più possibile i contatti con le persone. Ora sta per iniziare le medie e la sua unica amica, Yawara Kai, andrà in un'altra scuola. Questo vuol dire che Bocchi rimarrà da sola, circondata da nuovi compagni con i quali dovrà fare amicizia, prima di poter parlare di nuovo con Kai. Difatti le due si sono fatte una promessa: non saranno più amiche se entro il diploma Hitori non sarà amica con tutti i suoi compagni di classe.
description.pt-br:
Hitori Bocchi sofre de extrema ansiedade social, ela não é boa em falar com as pessoas, toma ações bastante extremas, é surpreendentemente hábil em evitar as pessoas, suas pernas ficam com cãibras quando ela se esforça demais, fica cheia de si quando está sozinha, vomita quando exposta a tensão extrema  e muitas vezes vem com planos para conseguir fazer amizades.  Agora ela está entrando no ensino médio e sua única amiga, Yawara Kai, está frequentando uma escola diferente.  Kai lhe dá um ultimato: ela deixará de ser amiga de Bocchi isso até que Bocchi faça amizade com todos os seus colegas de classe.  Bocchi vai conseguir!?

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments. A heartwarming, cute and funny youth-comedy crafted by the master of comedy, Asato Mizu!
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。コメディの名手・水あさとが手掛ける、笑えて泣けて可愛い青春コメディ！
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!

title.en: I Reincarnated as a Faint Hearted Countess

altTitles.ja: 転生先が気弱すぎる伯爵夫人だった
転生先が気弱すぎる伯爵夫人だった～前世最強魔女は快適生活を送りたい～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei-saki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin datta
Tenseisaki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin Datta - Zense Saikyou Majo wa Kaiteki Seikatsu wo Okuritai
Tensei-saki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin datta: Zense Saikyou Majo wa Kaiteki Seikatsu wo Okuritai

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as an Overly Timid Countess

altTitles.ja-ro: Tenseisaki ga Kiyowa Sugiru Hakushaku Fujin Datta

description.en: The cowardly Countess Ram, who is constantly lambasted by her maids, is having an ordeal at the place she was wed. She is supposed to be a newlywed, but her husband, the Count, didn’t even pay regard to her. Then one day, she hits her head on a wall and regains her memory of her previous life. Ram of the previous life was a great witch who was touted as the most powerful in the country. Fed up with her cramped life, she decides to live on her own terms, taking advantage of the memories she regained.
description.ja:
男爵家の令嬢ラムは、気弱すぎる性格と“魔力持ち”という特殊な体質ゆえ、両親や妹たちから執拗な虐めを受けていた。
嫁ぎ先でも夫の伯爵シャールに見向きもされず使用人からも嫌がらせを受ける灰色の日々。
――そう、前世の記憶が蘇るまでは。
頭を強く打った拍子に、思い出したのだ。
己が歴史に名を残す最強の魔女だったことを。

「これが、本当の私――！」

記憶と共に規格外の魔力を取り戻した彼女に虐めに耐えるだけの少女の面影はもうなかった…。
虐げられた令嬢による華麗な大逆転劇の幕が上がる!!

description.el: Ο Gol D. Roger, ένας άνθρωπος που αναφέρεται ως «Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών», πρόκειται να εκτελεστεί από την Παγκόσμια Κυβέρνηση. Αλλά λίγο πριν τον θάνατό του, επιβεβαιώνει την ύπαρξη ενός μεγάλου θησαυρού, του One Piece, που βρίσκεται κάπου μέσα στον απέραντο ωκεανό γνωστό ως Μεγάλη Γραμμή. Ανακοινώνοντας ότι το One Piece μπορεί να διεκδικηθεί από οποιονδήποτε άξιο να το φτάσει, ο Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών εκτελείται και η Μεγάλη Εποχή των Πειρατών ξεκινά. Είκοσι χρόνια αργότερα, ένας νεαρός με το όνομα Monkey D. Luffy είναι έτοιμος να ξεκινήσει τη δική του περιπέτεια, αναζητώντας το One Piece και πασχίζοντας να γίνει ο νέος Βασιλιάς των Πειρατών. Οπλισμένος μόνο με ένα ψάθινο καπέλο, μια μικρή βάρκα και ένα ελαστικό σώμα, ξεκινά ένα φανταστικό ταξίδι για να συγκεντρώσει το δικό του πλήρωμα και ένα άξιο πλοίο που θα τους διασχίσει τη Μεγάλη Γραμμή για να διεκδικήσει τη μεγαλύτερη θέση στην ανοιχτή θάλασσα.
description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

altTitles.en: Rationalization of Irregularities

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

description.en:
I transmigrated into a novel as the villainess Rubelina, whose hopes of marrying the Crown Prince were dashed by the heroine Yvonne. I believed I could live happily as long as I stayed out of the love story between the heroine and the hero, Zilart. I lived my life without caring about them at all and as a result, the heroine and the hero became engaged without any trouble.

Thinking that my role was over, I was living peacefully when suddenly Yvonne came to visit me and blurted out:

"I want to break off my engagement with Prince Zilart!"

Um... in the novel, Rubelina is supposed to be the villainess, and Yvonne is supposed to be the heroine who lives happily ever after, isn't she...?

description.en:
Koichi quit his job and became a novelist. However, he could not think of any topic and was unable to write a novel.
One day, in order to concentrate on his novel, he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside, but there he meets Ichika, a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside.

She's sexually uninhibited and seems like she'll let you have sex right away, but she also has a strong desire to get married, and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika, and before he knows it, he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason, I ended up living with Ichika!!!?

And so begins the life of living together with a tan gal. 

When Ichika invites him to have sex with her in order to have a child, will Koichi be able to suppress his rationality and successfully complete his novel?

A slightly naughty marriage story about having a child.

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67452)
description.ja:
脱サラして小説家になった孝一。しかし、何も題材が思い浮かばず、小説が書けない毎日を過ごしていた。
そんなある日、小説に集中するために、祖父が所有するアトリエに住むために、ド田舎に引っ越すことに。何もない田舎に呆然する孝一だったが、そこで田舎に不釣り合いな黒ギャル女子高生・一花と出会う。

性に奔放ですぐにでもヤらせてくれそうな彼女、だけど結婚願望も強く、料理上手に人を立てるのも上手い。そんな一花に心惹かれた孝一は、いつしか彼女を自分の小説のヒロインにしたいと思い…。なぜか一花と同棲をすることになっていた!!!?

こうして始まる、黒ギャルとの同棲生活。子供を作るためにセック●に誘ってくる一花に、孝一は理性を抑え、小説を無事完成できるのか!?

これは、性に奔放な彼女と小説家が結婚して子供を作る、ちょっとHな結婚物語――。
description.pt-br:
Koichi largou o emprego e tornou-se autor de light novel. No entanto, ele não conseguia pensar em nenhum assunto e não conseguia escrever um romance. Um dia, para se concentrar no romance, ele decide se mudar para o campo para morar no ateliê de seu avô.

Koichi fica surpreso com o campo vazio, mas lá ele conhece Ichika, uma estudante bronzeada que está deslocada no campo. Ela é sexualmente desinibida e parece que vai deixar você fazer sexo imediatamente, mas também tem um forte desejo de se casar e é boa em cozinhar e administrar pessoas. Koichi se sente atraído por Ichika e, antes que perceba, quer fazer dela a heroína de seu próprio romance.

Por algum motivo acabei morando com Ichika!!!? E assim começa a vida de convivência com uma garota bronzeada. Quando Ichika o convida para fazer sexo com ela para ter um filho, Koichi será capaz de suprimir sua racionalidade e completar com sucesso seu romance? Uma história de casamento um pouco perversa sobre ter um filho. 

Obs: Baseado em um hentai feito pelo próprio autor.

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---

description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.

title.en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイトが心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises
I'm Worried About My Classmate That's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pt-br: Estou preocupado com minha colega de classe coberta de hematomas

altTitles.ro: Sunt îngrijorat Pentru o Colegă Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей однокласснице покрытой синяками

altTitles.tr: Her Tarafı Bandaj Kaplı Olan Sınıf Arkadaşım Hakkında Endişeleniyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi lo lắng cho người bạn cùng lớp đầy những vết bầm tím

description.en: A story from the perspective of a concerned protagonist and a female classmate who's suspiciously covered in bruises.

title.en: Watashi wo Center ni suru to Chikaimasu ka?

altTitles.ja: 私をセンターにすると誓いますか？

altTitles.en: Do You Swear to Center Me?

description.en:
"If you really can make me the center of the group... I'll marry you."

Mizuki Natsuno is the least popular member of the idol group "Melty Strawberry." Koichi Okuda is the only person in the world who continues to support Mizuki. Two people who should never be connected, end up in a cooperative relationship under one roof, working her way up from the bottom of the ranks to become the leader of the group.

A story about the "Japanese Dream" begins, as they work together as a team to reach stardom in the entertainment world!

altTitles.en: Best Wishes, Bitch

description.en: "I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that." Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning... To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
description.es-la: "Te he estado engañando. Ah, y no es sólo un chico. Son tres. Lo siento". En la secundaria, la primera novia de Akiyoshi Sunao le destrozó el corazón y renunció al amor. Sin embargo, todo eso cambia cuando se enamora de una chica en el club de cine de su universidad. Justo cuando finalmente comienza a dejar atrás el pasado, se topa con su exnovia. Lo que no sabe es que esto es sólo el comienzo... ¡Para su horror, se despierta en su cuerpo a la mañana siguiente!
description.pt-br: "Eu tenho te traído. Ah, e não é apenas um cara. São três. Desculpe por isso." De volta ao ensino médio, o primeiro amor de Akiyoshi Sunao despedaçou seu coração, e ele jurou evitar o amor. No entanto, tudo muda quando ele se apaixona por uma garota no clube de cinema da universidade. Justo quando ele está começando a superar o passado, ele esbarra com sua ex-namorada. Mal sabe ele que isso é apenas o começo... Para seu horror, ele acorda no corpo dela na manhã seguinte!

description.en: The Spookiness is a supernatural story following two friends whose lives have been turned upside-down by a myriad of monsters that have started to appear. Follow Jaquie November and Brooke Haith as they fight to discover the answers to mysteries, all while navigating their feelings for each other. Start reading now for spooky dangers, silly gags, monster girls, and a nice dose of blushy GL goodness!

altTitles.en: The Suffering of the Mermaid Princess

description.en: A collection of stories full of happiness for those who like happiness. Gags are included.

altTitles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン・ユナイタル・リング

altTitles.en: SAO Unital Ring

description.en: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
description.es-la: Ha pasado un año desde el regreso de Kirito y Asuna del Underworld. Con ellos está Alice, que ha recibido un cuerpo físico. Pero su paz se rompe rápidamente cuando los tres se ven empujados de repente a un juego desconocido, Unital Ring. Este nuevo mundo es un MMO de supervivencia que fusiona todos los VRMMO creados con el programa "The Seed". Nada más empezar, Kirito se encuentra sin nada más que su ropa interior. Ahora, ¡Tiene que desafiar a un misterioso VRMMOSVG en circunstancias desesperadas!

title.en: SSS-Rank Paladin Who Transcends Common Sense

altTitles.zh: SSS jí chāoyuè chánglǐ de shèng qíshì

altTitles.en: SSS Grade Saint Knight

description.en: The game descended on reality, monsters run rampant, magical disasters overflow, everyone needs to choose a class and level up to become stronger. Zhou Yi who has been unremarkable until now awakened the S+ rank talent Protection of the Sacred Angel on the day of class awakening, turning his class into the hidden class Sacred Knight! Weapon blessing, angel blessing, honor blessing… With all sorts of buffs, Zhou Yi destroyed the space itself with just his aura. Who was it that said sacred knight is just a mundane class?
description.fr: Le jeu est entré dans la réalité, les monstres se déchaînent, les catastrophes magiques débordent, chacun doit choisir une classe et monter en niveau pour devenir plus fort. Zhou Yi, qui n'avait rien de remarquable jusqu'à présent, a éveillé le talent de rang S+ Protection de l'ange sacré le jour de l'éveil de classe, transformant sa classe en classe cachée Chevalier sacré ! Bénédiction de l'arme, bénédiction de l'ange, bénédiction de l'honneur... Avec toutes sortes d'améliorations, Zhou Yi détruisait l'espace lui-même avec sa seule aura. Qui a dit que le Chevalier sacré n'était qu'une classe banale ?
description.pt-br: O jogo emerge na realidade, os monstros correm desenfreados, os desastres mágicos transbordam, todos precisam escolher uma classe e subir de nível para aprimorarem a sua força. Zhou Yi, que tem sido uma pessoa normal até então, despertou o talento de classificação S+ "Proteção do Anjo Sagrado" no dia de despertar de classes, transformando sua classe na classe oculta "Cavaleiro Sagrado"! Bênção de arma, bênção do anjo, bênção de honra... Com todos os tipos de buffs, Zhou Yi destruiu o próprio espaço apenas com sua aura. Quem foi que disse que o paladino era uma classe mundana?

altTitles.en: Overlord of Insects,
The King of the Insects

description.en: Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

Cross Academy is attended by two groups of students: the Day Class and the Night Class. At twilight, when the students of the Day Class return to their dorm, they cross paths with the Night Class on their way to school. Yuki Cross and Zero Kiryu are the Guardians of the school, protecting the Day Class from the Academy's dark secret: the Night Class is full of vampires!
description.pt-br: A história de Vampire Knight trata de uma garota chamada Kurosu Yuuki, que não se lembra de nada de seu passado anterior a um certo dia; dia em que foi salva por Kaname Kuran, um vampiro "puro-sangue" que decidiu ficar em paz com os humanos, não sugando mais seus sangue. Devido a morte dos pais de Yuuki, Kaname leva-a para uma escola chamada Cross Academy, que aceita vampiros e humanos em paz na mesma escola, separando-os em Classe do Dia e Classe da Noite. Porém, para que os vampiros permaneçam na escola, não podem revelar sua identidade de vampiros e não podem sugar o sangue de ninguém.

title.en: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner

altTitles.en: Necromancer Academy's Genius Summoner

description.en: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

altTitles.en: Forced Attack 100%

description.en:
An accident forced two handsome schoolboys who originally disliked each other to bind together in a love game. Chi Che became a game player, while Cen Huang’s soul left his body to become a game system. In order to return back to normal, both player and system can only brace themselves and complete the rest of the game’s strategy missions. What’s outrageous is that the attack target is unexpectedly Cen Huang’s soulless body?! Thus, a straight guy helping another straight guy pursue his own dramatic love game has now begun…

A dangerous control freak senior who refuses to socialize x an optimistic talkative junior who lacks love.

The first ecchi in history.

Beginning in the first issue of Weekly Shonen Jump (ch 2). The nature of the content is very extreme with both teachers and students being involved in perverted situations. Over the publication, Go Nagai included more extreme content at the encouragement of his editor. As the manga continued its serialization, it garnered more and more controversy from parents. As a result, the Jump Editorial Dept. decided to cancel the serial. 

Nagai, in response to the controversy, decided to end off the manga [End of part 1] with the very infamous "Harenchi War" (Shameless War) arc.

_(spoiler)
The arc kills off the majority of the cast in a very gory and disturbing manner and remains a very infamous arc to this day._


Shameless School is controversial in Japan even today and is regarded as a "traumatic work" by several news publications.

The manga consists of 3 parts, with the last left unfinished due to the cancellation. + last volume includes 3 chapters backstory arc for Bearded Godzilla.

altTitles.en: Chronicles of the Jungle Sovereign

description.en: Lin Tian, a genius game designer, was ordered to be executed because he knew too much of the company secrets. At a critical moment, he was betrayed by his lover Luo Yue and was killed in the jungle. When he woke up, he found he became a low-level monster in the jungle. In order to avenge the past, the male protagonist started on his path as a Monster in The Jungle.
